alert.note: Alert for Alachua; Bradford (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 5:43PM EDT until July 22 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Bradford County in northern Florida... Northeastern Alachua County in northern Florida... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 543 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sampson, or 11 miles west of Keystone Heights, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sampson, Waldo and Brooker. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
